resources.string: anytime anywhere always your files are here

As our Terms of Service state, "You retain ownership of any intellectual property rights that you hold in that content. In short, what belongs to you stays yours."
We do not claim ownership in any of your content, including any text, data, information, and files that you upload, share, or store in your 1TapDOCs account. What our Terms of Service do is enable us to give you the services you want â€” so if you decide to share a document with someone, or want to open it on a different device, we can provide that functionality.
You control who can access your files in 1TapDOCs. We will not share your files and data with others except as described in our Privacy Policy. We will not change a Private document into a Public one. We are using firebase as our database and we tried our best to maintain all the security rules to keep your data secure.If anything happen in future with firebase then we are not responsible at all. We will not use a Private document for marketing or promotional campaigns. We will keep your data only as long as you ask us to keep it. You can take your data with you if you choose to stop using 1TapDOCs.

Before moving ahead you have to accept our privacy policy and terms and conditions.\n"You retain ownership of any intellectual property rights that you hold in that content." In short, what belongs to you stays yours.\n If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that I collect is used for providing and improving the Service. I will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy. The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which are accessible at 1TapDOCs unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.
Write down what you are thinking currently. This will keeps you reminded when you see this next time.
Hey,\n Tell us your present thought!
